official_title: A bill to provide for annual observances of certain legal holidays on their traditional dates.

summary.text: Redesignates the legal public holiday for Washington's Birthday as February 22 and for Memorial Day as May 30. Excludes Columbus Day as a legal public holiday.

titles.title: A bill to provide for annual observances of certain legal holidays on their traditional dates.
